alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 2:03PM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches valley floor, up to 4 inches benches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Saturday evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions will be possible through the evening commute, particularly along east bench routes. Widespread winter driving conditions are expected Saturday evening into Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
